name: Issue 1
description: Welcome to the very first issue of Drawnography! - First 40 covers screen printed (SOLD OUT) - Original lino stamp - Pull out poster by Zanna Allen - 38 pages of work from illustrators, photographers and graphic artists - Exclusive interview with Kate Gibb More photos Will arrive in 3 to 5 days all nice and cosy in it's packaging.

name: Issue 2
description: Issue 2 of Drawnography features... - Special Christmas theme! - First 48 covers screen printed with silver sparkle ink on blue card sleeves - Laser cut wood Xmas tree decorations from 4 different illustrators - Original lino stamp - 44 pages of work from illustrators, photographers and graphic artists - Exclusive interview with comic artist Woodrow Phoenix More photos Will arrive in 3 to 5 days all nice and cosy in it's packaging.

name: 2 for £2.99
description:
82 pages of Drawnography loveliness for £2.99! 

- Original lino stamp 
- Free extras
- Work from illustrators, photographers and graphic artists
- Exclusive interviews

Will arrive in 3 to 5 days all nice and cosy in it's packaging.
